00054 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 //    QuickEraseMapTile
00056 //
00057 //    Performs ersing operation when the DEL key is hit in the editor
00058 //
00059 void QuickEraseMapTile( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00060 {
00061       if ( iMapIndex >= 0x8000 )
00062             return;
00063       AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00064       DeleteStuffFromMapTile( iMapIndex );
00065       MarkWorldDirty();
00066 }

00070 //    DeleteStuffFromMapTile
00071 //
00072 //    Common delete function for both QuickEraseMapTile and EraseMapTile
00073 //
00074 void DeleteStuffFromMapTile( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00075 {
00076       //UINT16          usUseIndex;
00077       //UINT16          usType;
00078       //UINT32          uiCheckType;
00079       //UINT16          usDummy;
00080 
00081       //GetTileType( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pLandHead->usIndex, &uiCheckType );          
00082       //RemoveLand( iMapIndex, gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pLandHead->usIndex );              
00083       //SmoothTerrainRadius( iMapIndex, uiCheckType, 1, TRUE );         
00084 
00085       RemoveExitGridFromWorld( iMapIndex );
00086       RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTTEXTURE, WIREFRAMES );
00087       RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTTEXTURE, WIREFRAMES );
00088       RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTTEXTURE, WIREFRAMES );
00089       RemoveAllLandsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTTEXTURE, WIREFRAMES );
00090       RemoveAllRoofsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTTEXTURE, WIREFRAMES );
00091       RemoveAllOnRoofsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTTEXTURE, WIREFRAMES );
00092       RemoveAllTopmostsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTTEXTURE, WIREFRAMES );
00093       PasteRoomNumber( iMapIndex, 0 );
00094 }

00097 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 //    EraseMapTile
00099 //
00100 //    Generic tile erasing function. Erases things from the world depending on the current drawing mode
00101 //
00102 void EraseMapTile( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00103 {
00104       INT32             iEraseMode;
00105       UINT32            uiCheckType;
00106       if ( iMapIndex >= 0x8000 )
00107             return;
00108 
00109       // Figure out what it is we are trying to erase
00110       iEraseMode = iDrawMode - DRAW_MODE_ERASE;
00111 
00112       switch ( iEraseMode )
00113       {
00114             case DRAW_MODE_NORTHPOINT:
00115             case DRAW_MODE_WESTPOINT:
00116             case DRAW_MODE_EASTPOINT:
00117             case DRAW_MODE_SOUTHPOINT:
00118             case DRAW_MODE_CENTERPOINT:
00119             case DRAW_MODE_ISOLATEDPOINT:
00120                   SpecifyEntryPoint( iMapIndex );
00121                   break;
00122             case DRAW_MODE_EXITGRID:
00123                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00124                   RemoveExitGridFromWorld( iMapIndex );
00125                   RemoveTopmost( (UINT16)iMapIndex, FIRSTPOINTERS8 );
00126                   break;
00127             case DRAW_MODE_GROUND:        
00128                   // Is there ground on this tile? if not, get out o here
00129                   if ( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pLandHead == NULL )
00130                         break;
00131             
00132                   // is there only 1 ground tile here? if so, get out o here
00133                   if ( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pLandHead->pNext == NULL )
00134                         break;
00135                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00136                   GetTileType( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pLandHead->usIndex, &uiCheckType );            
00137                   RemoveLand( iMapIndex, gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pLandHead->usIndex );                
00138                   SmoothTerrainRadius( iMapIndex, uiCheckType, 1, TRUE );           
00139                   break;
00140             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
00141             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
00142             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
00143                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00144                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTOSTRUCT, LASTOSTRUCT );
00145                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTVEHICLE, SECONDVEHICLE );
00146                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTDEBRISSTRUCT, SECONDDEBRISSTRUCT );
00147                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, NINTHOSTRUCT, TENTHOSTRUCT );
00148                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTLARGEEXPDEBRIS, SECONDLARGEEXPDEBRIS );
00149                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, DEBRIS2MISC, DEBRIS2MISC );
00150                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, ANOTHERDEBRIS, ANOTHERDEBRIS );
00151                   break;
00152             case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
00153                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00154                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, DEBRISROCKS, LASTDEBRIS );
00155                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, DEBRIS2MISC, DEBRIS2MISC );
00156                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, ANOTHERDEBRIS, ANOTHERDEBRIS );
00157                   break;
00158             case DRAW_MODE_BANKS:
00159                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00160                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTROAD, LASTROAD );
00161                   // Note, for this routine, cliffs are considered a subset of banks
00162                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, ANIOSTRUCT, ANIOSTRUCT );
00163                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTCLIFF, LASTBANKS );
00164                   RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTCLIFFSHADOW, LASTCLIFFSHADOW );
00165                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTCLIFFHANG, LASTCLIFFHANG );
00166                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FENCESTRUCT, FENCESTRUCT );
00167                   RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FENCESHADOW, FENCESHADOW );
00168                   break;
00169             case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
00170                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00171                   RemoveAllLandsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTFLOOR, LASTFLOOR );
00172                   break;
00173             case DRAW_MODE_ROOFS:
00174             case DRAW_MODE_NEWROOF:
00175                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00176                   RemoveAllRoofsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTTEXTURE, LASTITEM );
00177                   RemoveAllOnRoofsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTTEXTURE, LASTITEM );
00178                   break;
00179             case DRAW_MODE_WALLS:
00180             case DRAW_MODE_DOORS:
00181             case DRAW_MODE_WINDOWS:
00182             case DRAW_MODE_BROKEN_WALLS:
00183                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00184                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALL, LASTWALL );
00185                   RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALL, LASTWALL );
00186                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTDOOR, LASTDOOR );
00187                   RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTDOORSHADOW, LASTDOORSHADOW );
00188                   break;
00189             case DRAW_MODE_DECOR:
00190             case DRAW_MODE_DECALS:
00191             case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:
00192             case DRAW_MODE_TOILET:
00193                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00194                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALLDECAL, LASTWALLDECAL );
00195                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIFTHWALLDECAL, EIGTHWALLDECAL );
00196                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTDECORATIONS, LASTDECORATIONS );
00197                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTISTRUCT, LASTISTRUCT );
00198                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIFTHISTRUCT, EIGHTISTRUCT );
00199                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTSWITCHES, FIRSTSWITCHES );
00200                   break;
00201             case DRAW_MODE_CAVES:
00202                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00203                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALL, LASTWALL );
00204                   break;
00205             case DRAW_MODE_ROOMNUM:
00206                   PasteRoomNumber( iMapIndex, 0 );
00207                   break;
00208             case DRAW_MODE_ROADS:
00209                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, ROADPIECES, ROADPIECES );
00210                   break;
00211             default:
00212                   //DeleteStuffFromMapTile( iMapIndex );
00213                   break;
00214       }
00215 }

00218 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00219 //    PasteDebris
00220 //    
00221 //    Place some "debris" on the map at the current mouse coordinates. This function is called repeatedly if
00222 //    the current brush size is larger than 1 tile.
00223 //
00224 void PasteDebris( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00225 {
00226       UINT16                        usUseIndex;
00227       UINT16                        usUseObjIndex;
00228       INT32                         iRandSelIndex;
00229 
00230       // Get selection list for debris
00231       pSelList = SelDebris;
00232       pNumSelList = &iNumDebrisSelected;
00233 
00234       if ( iMapIndex < 0x8000 )
00235       {  
00236             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00237 
00238             // Remove any debris that is currently at this map location
00239             if ( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pObjectHead != NULL )
00240             {
00241                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, ANOTHERDEBRIS, FIRSTPOINTERS - 1 );
00242             }
00243 
00244             // Get a random debris from current selection
00245             iRandSelIndex = GetRandomSelection( );
00246             if ( iRandSelIndex != -1 )
00247             {
00248                   // Add debris to the world
00249                   usUseIndex = pSelList[ iRandSelIndex ].usIndex;
00250                   usUseObjIndex = (UINT16)pSelList[ iRandSelIndex ].uiObject;
00251 
00252                   AddObjectToTail( iMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) );
00253             }
00254       }
00255 }

00287 {

00289       {
00290             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00291             gubWorldRoomInfo[ iMapIndex ] = ubRoomNumber;
00292       }

00295 void PasteSingleBrokenWall( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00296 {
00297       UINT16 usIndex, usObjIndex, usTileIndex, usWallOrientation;
00298 
00299       pSelList = SelSingleBrokenWall;
00300       pNumSelList = &iNumBrokenWallsSelected;
00301 
00302       usIndex = pSelList[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00303       usObjIndex = (UINT16)pSelList[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00304       usTileIndex = GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( usObjIndex, usIndex, &usTileIndex );
00305       GetWallOrientation( usTileIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00306       if( usWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_LEFT || usWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT )
00307             EraseHorizontalWall( iMapIndex );
00308       else
00309             EraseVerticalWall( iMapIndex );
00310 
00311       PasteSingleWallCommon( iMapIndex );
00312 }

00342 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00343 //    PasteSingleWallCommon
00344 //
00345 //    Common paste routine for PasteSingleWall, PasteSingleDoor, PasteSingleDecoration, and
00346 //    PasteSingleDecor (above). 
00347 //
00348 void PasteSingleWallCommon( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00349 {
00350       UINT16                        usUseIndex;
00351       UINT16                        usUseObjIndex;
00352       UINT16                        usTempIndex;
00353 
00354       if ( iMapIndex < 0x8000 )
00355       {  
00356             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00357 
00358             usUseIndex = pSelList[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00359             usUseObjIndex = (UINT16)pSelList[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00360 
00361             // TEMP STUFF FOR ONROOF THINGS!
00362             if ( (usUseObjIndex >= FIRSTONROOF) && (usUseObjIndex <= SECONDONROOF ) )
00363             {     
00364                   // Add to onroof section!
00365                   AddOnRoofToTail( iMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) );
00366 
00367                   if ( gTileDatabase[ (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) ].sBuddyNum != -1 )
00368                   {
00369                         AddOnRoofToTail( iMapIndex, gTileDatabase[ (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) ].sBuddyNum );
00370                   }
00371                   return;
00372             }
00373 
00374             // Make sure A-frames are on roof level!
00375             if ( ( usUseIndex >= WALL_AFRAME_START && usUseIndex <= WALL_AFRAME_END ) )
00376             {
00377                   AddRoofToTail( iMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) );
00378                   return;
00379             }
00380 
00381             if ( (usUseObjIndex >= FIRSTDOOR) && (usUseObjIndex <= LASTDOOR) )
00382             {
00383                   // PLace shadow for doors
00384                   if( !gfBasement )
00385                         AddExclusiveShadow( iMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex - FIRSTDOOR + FIRSTDOORSHADOW ] + usUseIndex  ) );
00386             }
00387 
00388             // Is it a wall?
00389             if ( ((usUseObjIndex >= FIRSTWALL) && (usUseObjIndex <= LASTWALL)) )
00390             {
00391                   // ATE            If it is a wall shadow, place differenty!
00392                   if ( usUseIndex == 29 || usUseIndex == 30 )
00393                   {
00394                         if( !gfBasement )
00395                               AddExclusiveShadow( iMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) );
00396                   }
00397                   else
00398                   {
00399                         // Slap down wall/window/door/decoration (no smoothing)
00400                         AddWallToStructLayer( iMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex), TRUE );
00401                   }
00402             }           
00403             // Is it a door/window/decoration?
00404             else if ( ( (usUseObjIndex >= FIRSTDOOR) && (usUseObjIndex <= LASTDOOR)) ||
00405                          ((usUseObjIndex >= FIRSTDECORATIONS) && (usUseObjIndex <= LASTDECORATIONS)) )
00406             {
00407                   // Slap down wall/window/door/decoration (no smoothing)
00408                   AddWallToStructLayer( iMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex), TRUE );
00409             }
00410             else if ( ((usUseObjIndex >= FIRSTROOF) && (usUseObjIndex <= LASTROOF))  ||
00411                                           ((usUseObjIndex >= FIRSTSLANTROOF) && (usUseObjIndex <= LASTSLANTROOF)) )
00412             {
00413                   // Put a roof on this tile (even if nothing else is here)
00414                   RemoveAllRoofsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTROOF, LASTROOF );
00415                   AddRoofToTail( iMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) );
00416             }
00417             else if ( (usUseObjIndex >= FIRSTFLOOR) && (usUseObjIndex <= LASTFLOOR) )
00418             {
00419                   // Drop a floor on this tile
00420                   if ( TypeExistsInLandLayer( iMapIndex, usUseObjIndex, &usTempIndex ) )
00421                         RemoveLand( iMapIndex, usTempIndex );
00422 
00423                   AddLandToHead( iMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) );
00424             }
00425             else if( usUseObjIndex >= FIRSTWALLDECAL && usUseObjIndex <= LASTWALLDECAL ||
00426                                      usUseObjIndex >= FIFTHWALLDECAL && usUseObjIndex <= EIGTHWALLDECAL )
00427             {
00428                   // Plop a decal here
00429                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTWALLDECAL, LASTWALLDECAL );
00430                   RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIFTHWALLDECAL, EIGTHWALLDECAL );
00431 
00432                   AddStructToTail( iMapIndex, (UINT16)( gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex ) );
00433             }
00434             else if ( usUseObjIndex >= FIRSTISTRUCT && usUseObjIndex <= LASTISTRUCT || 
00435                                           usUseObjIndex >= FIFTHISTRUCT && usUseObjIndex <= EIGHTISTRUCT )
00436             {
00437                   AddStructToHead( iMapIndex, (UINT16)( gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex ) );
00438             }
00439             else if( usUseObjIndex == FIRSTSWITCHES )
00440             {
00441                   AddStructToTail( iMapIndex, (UINT16)( gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex ) );
00442             }
00443 
00444       }
00445 }

00448 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00449 //    GetRandomIndexByRange
00450 //
00451 //    Returns a randomly picked object index given the current selection list, and the type or types of objects we want
00452 //    from that list. If no such objects are in the list, we return 0xffff (-1).
00453 UINT16 GetRandomIndexByRange( UINT16 usRangeStart, UINT16 usRangeEnd )
00454 {
00455       UINT16      usPickList[50];
00456       UINT16      usNumInPickList;
00457       UINT16      usWhich;
00458       UINT16      usObject;
00459       // Get a list of valid object to select from
00460       usNumInPickList = 0;
00461       for ( usWhich = 0; usWhich < *pNumSelList; usWhich++ )
00462       {
00463             usObject = (UINT16)pSelList[ usWhich ].uiObject; 
00464             if ( (usObject >= usRangeStart) && (usObject <= usRangeEnd) )
00465             {
00466                   usPickList[ usNumInPickList ] = usObject;
00467                   usNumInPickList++;
00468             }
00469       }
00470       return ( usNumInPickList ) ? usPickList[ rand() % usNumInPickList ] : 0xffff;
00471 }
00472 
00473 UINT16 GetRandomTypeByRange( UINT16 usRangeStart, UINT16 usRangeEnd )
00474 {
00475       UINT16      usPickList[50];
00476       UINT16      usNumInPickList;
00477       UINT16      i;
00478       UINT16      usObject;
00479       UINT32  uiType;
00480       // Get a list of valid object to select from
00481       usNumInPickList = 0;
00482       for ( i = 0; i < *pNumSelList; i++ )
00483       {
00484             usObject = (UINT16)pSelList[ i ].uiObject; 
00485             if ( (usObject >= usRangeStart) && (usObject <= usRangeEnd) )
00486             {
00487                   GetTileType( usObject, &uiType ); 
00488                   usPickList[ usNumInPickList ] = (UINT16)uiType;
00489                   usNumInPickList++;
00490             }
00491       }
00492       return ( usNumInPickList ) ? usPickList[ rand() % usNumInPickList ] : 0xffff;
00493 }

00536 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00537 //    PasteStructureCommon
00538 //
00539 //    This is the main (common) structure pasting function. The above three wrappers are only required because they
00540 //    each use different selection lists. Other than that, they are COMPLETELY identical.
00541 //
00542 void PasteStructureCommon( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00543 {
00544       BOOLEAN                       fDoPaste = FALSE;
00545       UINT32                        fHeadType;
00546       UINT16                        usUseIndex;
00547       UINT16                        usUseObjIndex;
00548       INT32                         iRandSelIndex;
00549       BOOLEAN                       fOkayToAdd;
00550 
00551       if ( iMapIndex < 0x8000 )
00552       {  
00553       /*
00554             if ( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pStructHead != NULL )
00555             {
00556                   fDoPaste = FALSE;
00557             }
00558             else
00559             {
00560                   // Nothing is here, paste
00561                   fDoPaste = TRUE;
00562             }
00563 */
00564             if ( /*fDoPaste &&*/ iMapIndex < 0x8000 )
00565             {
00566                   iRandSelIndex = GetRandomSelection( );
00567                   if ( iRandSelIndex == -1 )
00568                   {
00569                         return; 
00570                   }
00571 
00572                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00573 
00574                   usUseIndex = pSelList[ iRandSelIndex ].usIndex;
00575                   usUseObjIndex = (UINT16)pSelList[ iRandSelIndex ].uiObject;
00576 
00577                   // Check with Structure Database (aka ODB) if we can put the object here!
00578                   fOkayToAdd = OkayToAddStructureToWorld( (INT16)iMapIndex, 0, gTileDatabase[ (gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) ].pDBStructureRef, INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID );
00579                   if ( fOkayToAdd || (gTileDatabase[ (gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) ].pDBStructureRef == NULL) )
00580                   {
00581                         // Actual structure info is added by the functions below
00582                         AddStructToHead( iMapIndex, (UINT16)(gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex) );
00583                         // For now, adjust to shadows by a hard-coded amount,
00584                   
00585                         // Add mask if in long grass
00586                         GetLandHeadType( iMapIndex, &fHeadType  );
00587                   }
00588             }
00589       }
00590       else if ( CurrentStruct == ERASE_TILE && iMapIndex < 0x8000 )
00591       {
00592             RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTOSTRUCT, LASTOSTRUCT );
00593             RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, FIRSTSHADOW, LASTSHADOW );
00594       }
00595 }
00596 
00597 
00598 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00599 //    PasteBanks
00600 //
00601 //    Places a river bank or cliff into the world
00602 //
00603 void PasteBanks( UINT32 iMapIndex, UINT16 usStructIndex , BOOLEAN fReplace)
00604 {
00605       BOOLEAN                       fDoPaste = FALSE;
00606       UINT16                        usUseIndex;
00607       UINT16                        usUseObjIndex;
00608       UINT16 usIndex;
00609             
00610       pSelList = SelBanks;
00611       pNumSelList = &iNumBanksSelected;
00612 
00613       usUseIndex = pSelList[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00614       usUseObjIndex = (UINT16)pSelList[ iCurBank ].uiObject;
00615 
00616       if ( iMapIndex < 0x8000 )
00617       {  
00618             fDoPaste = TRUE;
00619 
00620             if (  gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pStructHead != NULL )
00621             {
00622                         // CHECK IF THE SAME TILE IS HERE
00623                         if ( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pStructHead->usIndex == (UINT16)( gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex ) )
00624                         {
00625                               fDoPaste = FALSE;
00626                         }
00627             }
00628             else
00629             {
00630                   // Nothing is here, paste
00631                   fDoPaste = TRUE;
00632             }
00633 
00634             if ( fDoPaste )
00635             {
00636 
00637                   usIndex = gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex;
00638 
00639                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00640 
00641                   {
00642                               if ( usUseObjIndex == FIRSTROAD )
00643                               {
00644                                     AddObjectToHead( iMapIndex, (UINT16)( gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex ) );
00645                               }
00646                               else
00647                               {
00648                                     AddStructToHead( iMapIndex, (UINT16)( gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex ] + usUseIndex ) );
00649                                     // Add shadows
00650                                     if ( !gfBasement && usUseObjIndex == FIRSTCLIFF ) 
00651                                     {
00652                                           //AddShadowToHead( iMapIndex, (UINT16)( gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex - FIRSTCLIFF + FIRSTCLIFFSHADOW ] + usUseIndex ) );
00653                                           AddObjectToHead( iMapIndex, (UINT16)( gTileTypeStartIndex[ usUseObjIndex - FIRSTCLIFF + FIRSTCLIFFHANG ] + usUseIndex ) );
00654                                     }
00655                               }
00656                   }
00657             }
00658       }
00659 }
00660 
00661 void PasteRoads( UINT32 iMapIndex )

00663       UINT16                        usUseIndex;
00664             
00665       pSelList = SelRoads;
00666       pNumSelList = &iNumRoadsSelected;
00667 
00668       usUseIndex = pSelList[ iCurBank ].usIndex;
00669 
00670       PlaceRoadMacroAtGridNo( iMapIndex, usUseIndex );
00671 }

00673 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00674 //    PasteTexture
00675 //
00676 //    Puts a ground texture in the world. Ground textures are then "smoothed" in order to blend the edges with one
00677 //    another. The current drawing brush also affects this function.
00678 //
00679 void PasteTexture( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00680 {
00681       ChooseWeightedTerrainTile(); //Kris
00682       PasteTextureCommon( iMapIndex );
00683 }
00684 
00685 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00686 //    PasteTextureCommon
00687 //
00688 //    The PasteTexture function calls this one to actually put a ground tile down. If the brush size is larger than
00689 //    one tile, then the above function will call this one and indicate that they should all be placed into the undo
00690 //    stack as the same undo command.
00691 //
00692 void PasteTextureCommon( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00693 {
00694        UINT8                              ubLastHighLevel;
00695        UINT16                             usTileIndex;
00696        //UINT16                           Dummy;
00697    
00698        if ( CurrentPaste != NO_TILE && iMapIndex < 0x8000 )
00699        {
00700 
00701              // Set undo, then set new
00702              AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00703 
00704              if ( CurrentPaste == DEEPWATERTEXTURE )
00705              {
00706                    // IF WE ARE PASTING DEEP WATER AND WE ARE NOT OVER WATER, IGNORE!
00707                    if ( TypeExistsInLandLayer( iMapIndex, REGWATERTEXTURE, &usTileIndex ) )
00708                    {
00709                               if ( !gTileDatabase[ usTileIndex ].ubFullTile )
00710                               {
00711                                      return;
00712                               }
00713                    }
00714                    else
00715                    {
00716                               return;
00717                    }
00718              }
00719 
00720              // Don't draw over floors
00721              if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( iMapIndex, FIRSTFLOOR, FOURTHFLOOR, &usTileIndex ) )
00722              {
00723                    return;
00724              }
00725 
00726 
00727 
00728              // Compare heights and do appropriate action
00729              if ( AnyHeigherLand( iMapIndex, CurrentPaste, &ubLastHighLevel ) )
00730              {
00731                    // Here we do the following:
00732                    // - Remove old type from layer
00733                    // - Smooth World with old type
00734                    // - Add a 3 by 3 square of new type at head
00735                    // - Smooth World with new type
00736                    PasteHigherTexture( iMapIndex, CurrentPaste );
00737 
00738              }
00739              else
00740              {
00741                         PasteTextureEx( (INT16)iMapIndex, CurrentPaste );
00742                         SmoothTerrainRadius( iMapIndex, CurrentPaste, 1, TRUE );
00743              }
00744       }
00745 }
00746 
00747 
00748 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00749 //    PasteHigherTexture
00750 //
00751 //    Some ground textures should be placed "above" others. That is, grass needs to be placed "above" sand etc.
00752 //    This function performs the appropriate actions.
00753 //
00754 void PasteHigherTexture( UINT32 iMapIndex, UINT32 fNewType )
00755 {
00756        UINT16                             NewTile;
00757        UINT8                              ubLastHighLevel;
00758        UINT32                             *puiDeletedTypes = NULL;
00759        UINT8                              ubNumTypes;
00760        UINT8                              cnt;
00761 
00762        // Here we do the following:
00763        // - Remove old type from layer
00764        // - Smooth World with old type
00765        // - Add a 3 by 3 square of new type at head
00766        // - Smooth World with new type
00767 
00768             //if ( iMapIndex < 0x8000 && TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( iMapIndex, FIRSTFLOOR, LASTFLOOR, &NewTile ) )
00769             //ATE: DONOT DO THIS!!!!!!! - I know what was intended - not to draw over floors - this
00770             // I don't know is the right way to do it!
00771                   //return;
00772 
00773 
00774        if ( iMapIndex < 0x8000 && AnyHeigherLand( iMapIndex, fNewType, &ubLastHighLevel ))
00775        {
00776              AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00777 
00778              // - For all heigher level, remove
00779              RemoveHigherLandLevels( iMapIndex, fNewType, &puiDeletedTypes, &ubNumTypes );
00780 
00781              // Set with a radius of 1 and smooth according to height difference
00782              SetLowerLandIndexWithRadius( iMapIndex, fNewType, 1 , TRUE );
00783 
00784              // Smooth all deleted levels
00785              for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ubNumTypes; cnt++ )
00786              {
00787                         SmoothTerrainRadius( iMapIndex, puiDeletedTypes[ cnt ], 1, TRUE );
00788              }
00789 
00790              MemFree( puiDeletedTypes );
00791 
00792        }
00793        else if ( iMapIndex < 0x8000 )
00794        {
00795                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00796 
00797           GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( fNewType, REQUIRES_SMOOTHING_TILE, &NewTile );
00798                   SetLandIndex( iMapIndex, NewTile, fNewType, FALSE );
00799 
00800                   // Smooth item then adding here
00801                   SmoothTerrain( iMapIndex, fNewType, &NewTile, FALSE );
00802 
00803               if ( NewTile != NO_TILE )
00804               {
00805                         // Change tile
00806                         SetLandIndex( iMapIndex, NewTile, fNewType, FALSE );
00807               }
00808        }
00809 }
00810 
00811 
00812 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00813 //    PasteHigherTextureFromRadius
00814 //
00815 //    Like above function except it performs it's operation on a redial area.
00816 //
00817 BOOLEAN PasteHigherTextureFromRadius( INT32 iMapIndex, UINT32 uiNewType, UINT8 ubRadius )
00818 {
00819       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00820       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00821       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
00822       INT32                   iNewIndex;
00823       INT32                   iXPos,iYPos;
00824       
00825       // Determine start and end indicies and num rows
00826       sTop        = ubRadius;
00827       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00828       sLeft   = -ubRadius;
00829       sRight  = ubRadius;
00830 
00831       iXPos = (iMapIndex % WORLD_COLS);
00832       iYPos = (iMapIndex - iXPos) / WORLD_COLS;
00833 
00834       if ( (iXPos + (INT32)sLeft) < 0 )
00835             sLeft = (INT16)(-iXPos);
00836 
00837       if ( (iXPos + (INT32)sRight) >= WORLD_COLS )
00838             sRight = (INT16)(WORLD_COLS - iXPos - 1);
00839 
00840       if ( (iYPos + (INT32)sTop) >= WORLD_ROWS )
00841             sTop = (INT16)(WORLD_ROWS - iYPos - 1);
00842 
00843       if ( (iYPos + (INT32)sBottom) < 0 )
00844             sBottom = (INT16)(-iYPos);
00845 
00846       if ( iMapIndex >= 0x8000 )
00847             return (FALSE);
00848 
00849       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00850       {
00851             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00852             {
00853                   iNewIndex = iMapIndex + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00854 
00855                   PasteHigherTexture( iNewIndex, uiNewType );
00856             }
00857       }
00858 
00859       return( TRUE );
00860 }
00861 
00862 
00863 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00864 //    PasteExistingTexture
00865 //
00866 BOOLEAN PasteExistingTexture( UINT32 iMapIndex, UINT16 usIndex )
00867 {
00868       UINT32                              uiNewType;
00869       UINT16                              usNewIndex;
00870       //UINT16                            Dummy;
00871 
00872       // If here, we want to make, esentially, what is a type in
00873       // a level other than TOP-MOST the TOP-MOST level. 
00874       // We should:
00875       // - remove what was top-most
00876       // - re-adjust the world to reflect missing top-most peice
00877 
00878       if ( iMapIndex >= 0x8000 )
00879             return ( FALSE );
00880 
00881       //if ( TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( iMapIndex, FIRSTFLOOR, LASTFLOOR, &Dummy ) )
00882       //    return( FALSE );
00883 
00884   // Get top tile index
00885       // Remove all land peices except
00886       GetTileType( usIndex, &uiNewType );
00887 
00888       DeleteAllLandLayers( iMapIndex );
00889 
00890       // ADD BASE LAND AT LEAST!
00891       usNewIndex = (UINT16)(rand( ) % 10 );
00892 
00893       // Adjust for type
00894       usNewIndex += gTileTypeStartIndex[ gCurrentBackground ];
00895 
00896       // Set land index
00897       AddLandToHead( iMapIndex, usNewIndex );
00898 
00899       SetLandIndex( iMapIndex, usIndex, uiNewType, FALSE );
00900 
00901       // ATE: Set this land peice to require smoothing again!
00902   SmoothAllTerrainTypeRadius( iMapIndex, 2, TRUE );
00903 
00904       return( TRUE );
00905 }
00906

00908 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00909 //    PasteExistingTextureFromRadius
00910 //
00911 //    As above, but on a radial area
00912 //
00913 BOOLEAN PasteExistingTextureFromRadius( INT32 iMapIndex, UINT16 usIndex, UINT8 ubRadius )
00914 {
00915       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00916       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00917       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
00918       INT32                   iNewIndex;
00919       INT32                   leftmost;
00920       
00921       // Determine start end end indicies and num rows
00922       sTop        = ubRadius;
00923       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00924       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00925       sRight  = ubRadius;
00926 
00927       if ( iMapIndex >= 0x8000 )
00928             return ( FALSE );
00929        
00930       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00931       {
00932 
00933             leftmost = ( ( iMapIndex + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00934 
00935             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00936             {
00937                   iNewIndex = iMapIndex + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00938 
00939                   if ( iNewIndex >=0 && iNewIndex < WORLD_MAX && 
00940                            iNewIndex >= leftmost && iNewIndex < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00941                   {
00942                         AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00943                         PasteExistingTexture( iNewIndex, usIndex );
00944                   }
00945 
00946             }
00947       }
00948 
00949       return( TRUE );
00950 }
00951 
00952 
00953 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00954 //    SetLowerLandIndexWithRadius
00955 //
00956 //    Puts a land index "under" an existing ground texture. Affects a radial area.
00957 //
00958 BOOLEAN SetLowerLandIndexWithRadius( INT32 iMapIndex, UINT32 uiNewType, UINT8 ubRadius, BOOLEAN fReplace )
00959 {
00960       UINT16                        usTempIndex;
00961       INT16                         sTop, sBottom;
00962       INT16                         sLeft, sRight;
00963       INT16                         cnt1, cnt2;
00964       INT32                     iNewIndex;
00965       BOOLEAN                       fDoPaste = FALSE;
00966       INT32                         leftmost;
00967       UINT8                         ubLastHighLevel;
00968   UINT32                      *puiSmoothTiles = NULL;
00969       INT16                     sNumSmoothTiles = 0;
00970       UINT16                        usTemp;
00971       UINT16                        NewTile; //,Dummy;
00972 
00973       // Determine start end end indicies and num rows
00974       sTop        = ubRadius;
00975       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00976       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00977       sRight  = ubRadius;
00978 
00979       if ( iMapIndex >= 0x8000 )
00980             return ( FALSE );
00981 
00982       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00983       {
00984 
00985             leftmost = ( ( iMapIndex + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00986 
00987             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00988             {
00989                   iNewIndex = iMapIndex + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00990 
00991                   if ( iNewIndex >=0 && iNewIndex < WORLD_MAX && 
00992                            iNewIndex >= leftmost && iNewIndex < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00993                   {
00994 
00995                         if ( fReplace )
00996                         {
00997                               fDoPaste = TRUE;
00998                         }
00999                         else
01000                         {
01001                               if ( TypeExistsInLandLayer( iNewIndex, uiNewType, &usTempIndex ) )
01002                               {
01003                                     fDoPaste = TRUE;
01004                               }
01005                         }
01006                         
01007                         //if ( fDoPaste && !TypeRangeExistsInLandLayer( iMapIndex, FIRSTFLOOR, LASTFLOOR, &Dummy ) )
01008                         if ( fDoPaste  )
01009                         {
01010                               if ( iMapIndex == iNewIndex )
01011                               {
01012                                     AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
01013 
01014                                     // Force middle one to NOT smooth, and set to random 'full' tile
01015                                     usTemp = ( rand( ) % 10 ) + 1;
01016                                     GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( uiNewType, usTemp, &NewTile );
01017                                     SetLandIndex( iNewIndex, NewTile, uiNewType, FALSE );
01018                               }
01019                               else if ( AnyHeigherLand( iNewIndex, uiNewType, &ubLastHighLevel ) )
01020                               {
01021                                     AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
01022 
01023                                     // Force middle one to NOT smooth, and set to random 'full' tile
01024                                     usTemp = ( rand( ) % 10 ) + 1;
01025                                     GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( uiNewType, usTemp, &NewTile );
01026                                     SetLandIndex( iNewIndex, NewTile, uiNewType, FALSE );
01027                               }
01028                               else
01029                               {
01030                                     AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
01031 
01032                                     // Set tile to 'smooth target' tile
01033                                     GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( uiNewType, REQUIRES_SMOOTHING_TILE, &NewTile );
01034                                     SetLandIndex( iNewIndex, NewTile, uiNewType, FALSE );
01035 
01036                                     // If we are top-most, add to smooth list
01037                                     sNumSmoothTiles++;
01038                                     puiSmoothTiles = (UINT32 *) MemRealloc( puiSmoothTiles, sNumSmoothTiles * sizeof( UINT32 ) );
01039                                     puiSmoothTiles[ sNumSmoothTiles-1 ] = iNewIndex;
01040                               }
01041                         }
01042                   }
01043             }
01044       }
01045 
01046       // Once here, smooth any tiles that need it
01047       if ( sNumSmoothTiles > 0 )
01048       {
01049             for (  cnt1 = 0; cnt1 < sNumSmoothTiles; cnt1++ )
01050             {
01051 
01052                   SmoothTerrainRadius( puiSmoothTiles[ cnt1 ], uiNewType, 10, FALSE );
01053 
01054             }
01055             MemFree( puiSmoothTiles );
01056       }
01057 
01058       return( TRUE );
01059 }
01060 
01061 // ATE FIXES
01062 void PasteTextureEx( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usType )
01063 {
01064       UINT16 usIndex;
01065       UINT8  ubTypeLevel;
01066       UINT16 NewTile;
01067 
01068       // CHECK IF THIS TEXTURE EXISTS!
01069   if ( TypeExistsInLandLayer( sGridNo, usType, &usIndex ) )
01070   {
01071                   if ( GetTypeLandLevel( sGridNo, usType, &ubTypeLevel ) )
01072                   {
01073                         // If top-land , do not change
01074                         if ( ubTypeLevel != LANDHEAD )
01075                         {                                                     
01076                               PasteExistingTexture( sGridNo, usIndex );
01077                         }
01078                   }
01079       }
01080       else
01081       {
01082 
01083              // Fill with just first tile, smoothworld() will pick proper piece later
01084              GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( usType, REQUIRES_SMOOTHING_TILE, &NewTile );
01085 
01086              SetLandIndex( sGridNo, NewTile, usType, FALSE );
01087       }
01088 
01089 }
01090 
01091 
01092 void PasteTextureFromRadiusEx( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usType, UINT8 ubRadius )
01093 {
01094       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
01095       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
01096       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
01097       INT32                   iNewIndex;
01098       INT32                   leftmost;
01099       
01100       // Determine start end end indicies and num rows
01101       sTop        = ubRadius;
01102       sBottom = -ubRadius;
01103       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
01104       sRight  = ubRadius;
01105 
01106       if ( sGridNo >= 0x8000 )
01107             return;
01108        
01109       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
01110       {
01111 
01112             leftmost = ( ( sGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
01113 
01114             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
01115             {
01116                   iNewIndex = sGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
01117 
01118                   if ( iNewIndex >=0 && iNewIndex < WORLD_MAX && 
01119                            iNewIndex >= leftmost && iNewIndex < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
01120                   {
01121                         PasteTextureEx( sGridNo, usType );
01122                   }
01123 
01124             }
01125       }
01126 
01127       return;
01128 }
01129 
01130 
01131 // FUNCTION TO GIVE NEAREST GRIDNO OF A CLIFF
01132 #define LAND_DROP_1 FIRSTCLIFF1
01133 #define LAND_DROP_2 FIRSTCLIFF11
01134 #define LAND_DROP_3 FIRSTCLIFF12
01135 #define LAND_DROP_4 FIRSTCLIFF15
01136 #define LAND_DROP_5 FIRSTCLIFF8
01137 void RaiseWorldLand( )
01138 {
01139       INT32                         cnt;
01140       UINT32                        sTempGridNo;
01141       LEVELNODE               *pStruct;
01142       TILE_ELEMENT      *pTileElement;
01143       BOOLEAN fRaise;
01144       BOOLEAN fRaiseSet;
01145       BOOLEAN fSomethingRaised = FALSE;
01146       UINT8 ubLoop;
01147       UINT16 usIndex;
01148       BOOLEAN fStopRaise = FALSE;
01149       INT32 iCounterA = 0, iCounterB = 0;
01150       INT32 iStartNumberOfRaises = 0;
01151       INT32 iNumberOfRaises = 0;
01152       BOOLEAN fAboutToRaise = FALSE;
01153       
01154       fRaise=FALSE;
01155       fRaiseSet=FALSE;
01156 
01157       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
01158       {
01159                   gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START );
01160                   gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END );
01161 
01162       }
01163       
01164       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
01165       {
01166 
01167             // Get Structure levelnode
01168             pStruct = gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].pStructHead;
01169             gpWorldLevelData[cnt].sHeight=0;
01170 
01171             while( pStruct )
01172             {
01173                   pTileElement = &(gTileDatabase[ pStruct->usIndex ]);
01174                   if (pTileElement->fType==FIRSTCLIFF)
01175                   {     
01176                         fSomethingRaised = TRUE;
01177                         // DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("Cliff found at count=%d",cnt));                                        
01178                         if( pTileElement->ubNumberOfTiles > 1 )
01179                         {
01180                               // DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("Cliff has %d children", pTileElement->ubNumberOfTiles));
01181                               for (ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < pTileElement->ubNumberOfTiles; ubLoop++)
01182                               {
01183                                     usIndex=pStruct->usIndex;
01184                                     // need means to turn land raising on and off based on the tile ID and the offset in the
01185                                     // tile database when reading into the mapsystem
01186                                     // turning off of land raising can only be done
01187                                     // presently by CLIFF object/tileset 1
01188                                     // so simply detect this tile set and turn off instead of on
01189                                     // element 1 is 12 tiles and is unique
01190  
01191                                     sTempGridNo = cnt + pTileElement->pTileLocData[ubLoop].bTileOffsetX + pTileElement->pTileLocData[ubLoop].bTileOffsetY * WORLD_COLS;
01192                                     // Check for valid gridno
01193                                     if ( OutOfBounds( (INT16)cnt, (INT16)sTempGridNo ) )
01194                                     {
01195                                           continue;
01196                                     }
01197                                     //if (pTileElement->ubNumberOfTiles==10)
01198                                     if((usIndex==LAND_DROP_1)||(usIndex==LAND_DROP_2) ||(usIndex==LAND_DROP_4)) 
01199                                     {
01200                                           gpWorldLevelData[sTempGridNo].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START );
01201                                           gpWorldLevelData[sTempGridNo].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END;
01202                                     }
01203                                     else if( ( usIndex==LAND_DROP_5 ) && ( ubLoop == 4 ) )
01204                                     {
01205                                           gpWorldLevelData[sTempGridNo].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START );
01206                                           gpWorldLevelData[sTempGridNo].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END;
01207                                           if( !( gpWorldLevelData[sTempGridNo + 1 ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START ) )
01208                                           {
01209                                                 gpWorldLevelData[sTempGridNo + 1].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START;
01210                                           }
01211                                     }
01212                                     else if( ( usIndex== LAND_DROP_3 ) && ( ( ubLoop == 0 ) || ( ubLoop == 1 ) || ( ubLoop == 2 )) )
01213                                     {
01214                                           gpWorldLevelData[sTempGridNo].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START );
01215                                           gpWorldLevelData[sTempGridNo].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END;
01216                                     }
01217                                     else
01218                                     {
01219                                           gpWorldLevelData[sTempGridNo].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START;
01220                                     }
01221                               }
01222                         }
01223                         else
01224                         {
01225                               if( usIndex==LAND_DROP_3 )
01226                               {
01227                                     gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START );
01228                                     gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END;
01229                               }
01230                               else
01231                               {
01232                                     //if (pTileElement->ubNumberOfTiles==10)
01233                                     if(usIndex==LAND_DROP_1)
01234                                     {
01235                                           gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START );
01236                                           gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END;
01237                                     }
01238                                     else
01239                                           gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START;
01240                               }
01241                         }
01242                   }
01243                   pStruct=pStruct->pNext;
01244             }
01245       }
01246 
01247       if (fSomethingRaised == FALSE)
01248       {
01249             // no cliffs
01250             return;
01251       }
01252 
01253       // run through again, this pass is for placing raiselandstart in rows that have raiseland end but no raiselandstart
01254       for (cnt=WORLD_MAX-1; cnt >=0 ; cnt--)
01255       {
01256             if(cnt%WORLD_ROWS==WORLD_ROWS-1)
01257             {
01258             // start of new row
01259             fRaiseSet=FALSE;
01260             }
01261             if (gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags&MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START)
01262             {
01263                   fRaiseSet=TRUE;   
01264             }
01265             else if((gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags&MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END)&&(!fRaiseSet))
01266             { 
01267                   // there is a dropoff without a rise.
01268                   // back up and set beginning to raiseland start
01269                   gpWorldLevelData[cnt+((WORLD_ROWS-1)-(cnt%WORLD_ROWS))].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END );
01270                   gpWorldLevelData[cnt+((WORLD_ROWS-1)-(cnt%WORLD_ROWS))].uiFlags|=MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START;
01271                   if(cnt+((WORLD_ROWS-1)-(cnt%WORLD_ROWS))-WORLD_ROWS >0)
01272                   {
01273                         gpWorldLevelData[cnt+((WORLD_ROWS-1)-(cnt%WORLD_ROWS))-WORLD_ROWS].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END );
01274                         gpWorldLevelData[cnt+((WORLD_ROWS-1)-(cnt%WORLD_ROWS))-WORLD_ROWS].uiFlags|=MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START;
01275                   }
01276                   fRaiseSet=TRUE;
01277             }
01278       }
01279       fRaiseSet=FALSE;
01280       // Look for a cliff face that is along either the lower edge or the right edge of the map, this is used for a special case fill
01281       // start at y=159, x= 80 and go to x=159, y=80
01282 
01283       // now check along x=159, y=80 to x=80, y=0
01284       for (cnt=( ( WORLD_COLS * WORLD_ROWS ) - ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * ( WORLD_ROWS - 2 ) - 1 ); cnt >WORLD_ROWS-1 ; cnt-=(WORLD_ROWS+1))
01285       {
01286             if( fAboutToRaise == TRUE )
01287             {
01288                   fRaiseSet=TRUE;
01289                   fAboutToRaise = FALSE;
01290             }
01291 
01292             if ((gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags&MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START)||(gpWorldLevelData[cnt-1].uiFlags&MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START)||(gpWorldLevelData[ cnt + 1 ].uiFlags&MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START))
01293             {
01294                   fAboutToRaise = TRUE;
01295                   fRaiseSet = FALSE;
01296             }
01297             else if((gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags&MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END)||(gpWorldLevelData[cnt-1].uiFlags&MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END) || ( gpWorldLevelData[cnt+1].uiFlags&MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END) )
01298             { 
01299                   fRaiseSet=FALSE;
01300             }
01301             if (fRaiseSet)
01302             {
01303                   gpWorldLevelData[cnt+((WORLD_ROWS-1)-(cnt%WORLD_ROWS))].uiFlags|=MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START;
01304                   //gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags|=MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START;
01305                   //gpWorldLevelData[cnt-1].uiFlags|=MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START;
01306                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Land Raise start at count: %d is raised",cnt ));
01307                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Land Raise start at count: %d is raised",cnt - 1 ));
01308             }
01309       }
01310 
01311       //fRaiseSet = FALSE;
01312 
01313       // Now go through the world, starting at x=max(x) and y=max(y) and work backwards
01314       // if a cliff is found turn raise flag on, if the end of a screen is found, turn off
01315       // the system uses world_cord=x+y*(row_size) 
01316 
01317 
01318       for (cnt=WORLD_MAX-1; cnt >= 0;  cnt--)
01319       {
01320             //  reset the RAISE to FALSE
01321             // End of the row 
01322             if ( !(cnt % WORLD_ROWS) )
01323             {
01324                   iNumberOfRaises = 0;
01325                   iStartNumberOfRaises = 0;
01326             }
01327 
01328             if( ( gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END ) )      
01329             {
01330                   if( cnt > 1 )
01331                   {
01332                         if( ( !( gpWorldLevelData[ cnt - 1 ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END) && !( gpWorldLevelData[ cnt - 2 ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_END ) ) )
01333                         {
01334                               iNumberOfRaises--;
01335                         }
01336                   }
01337             }
01338             else if( gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START )
01339             {
01340                   // check tile before and after, if either are raise land flagged, then don't increment number of 
01341                   // raises
01342                   if( cnt < WORLD_MAX - 2 )
01343                   {
01344                         if( ( !( gpWorldLevelData[ cnt + 1 ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START) && !( gpWorldLevelData[ cnt + 2 ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_RAISE_LAND_START ) )  )
01345                         {
01346                               iNumberOfRaises++;
01347                         }
01348                   }
01349             }
01350 
01351             // look at number of raises.. if negative, then we have more downs than ups, restart row with raises + 1;
01352             // now raise land of any tile while the flag is on
01353             if( iNumberOfRaises < 0 )
01354             {
01355                   // something wrong, reset cnt
01356                   iStartNumberOfRaises++;
01357                   cnt += WORLD_ROWS - cnt % WORLD_ROWS;
01358                   iNumberOfRaises = iStartNumberOfRaises;
01359                   continue;
01360             }
01361             
01362             if( iNumberOfRaises >= 0 )
01363             {
01364                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Land Raise start at count: %d is raised",cnt ));
01365                   gpWorldLevelData[cnt].sHeight=iNumberOfRaises * WORLD_CLIFF_HEIGHT;
01366             }
01367       }
01368 
01369       for (cnt=WORLD_MAX-1; cnt >= 0;  cnt--)
01370       {
01371             if( ( cnt < WORLD_MAX - WORLD_ROWS ) && ( cnt > WORLD_ROWS ) )
01372             {
01373                   if( ( gpWorldLevelData[cnt + WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight == gpWorldLevelData[cnt - WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight ) && ( gpWorldLevelData[ cnt  ].sHeight!= gpWorldLevelData[cnt - WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight ) )
01374                   {
01375                         gpWorldLevelData[cnt].sHeight = gpWorldLevelData[cnt + WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight;
01376                   }
01377                   else if( ( gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].sHeight > gpWorldLevelData[cnt - WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight )&& ( gpWorldLevelData[cnt + WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight != gpWorldLevelData[cnt - WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight ) && ( gpWorldLevelData[cnt ].sHeight > gpWorldLevelData[cnt + WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight ) ) 
01378                   {
01379                         if( gpWorldLevelData[cnt - WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight > gpWorldLevelData[cnt + WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight )
01380                         {
01381                                gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].sHeight = gpWorldLevelData[cnt - WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight;
01382                         }
01383                         else
01384                         {
01385                               gpWorldLevelData[ cnt ].sHeight = gpWorldLevelData[cnt + WORLD_ROWS ].sHeight;
01386                         }
01387                   }
01388             }
01389       }
01390 
01391 //*/
01392 
01393 }
01394 
01395 void EliminateObjectLayerRedundancy()
01396 {
01397       INT32 i, numRoads, numAnothers;
01398       UINT32 uiType;
01399       LEVELNODE *pObject, *pValidRoad, *pValidAnother;
01400       UINT16 usIndex;
01401 
01402       for( i = 0; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
01403       { //Eliminate all but the last ROADPIECE and ANOTHERDEBRIS
01404             pObject = gpWorldLevelData[ i ].pObjectHead;
01405             pValidRoad = pValidAnother = NULL;
01406             numRoads = numAnothers = 0;
01407             while( pObject )
01408             {
01409                   GetTileType( pObject->usIndex, &uiType );
01410                   if( uiType == ROADPIECES )
01411                   { //keep track of the last valid road piece, and count the total
01412                         pValidRoad = pObject;
01413                         numRoads++;
01414                   }
01415                   else if( uiType == ANOTHERDEBRIS )
01416                   { //keep track of the last valid another debris, and count the total
01417                         pValidAnother = pObject;
01418                         numAnothers++;
01419                   }
01420                   pObject = pObject->pNext;
01421             }
01422             if( pValidRoad && numRoads > 1 )
01423             { //we have more than two roadpieces on the same gridno, so get rid of them, replacing it
01424                   //with the visible one.
01425                   usIndex = pValidRoad->usIndex;
01426                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( i, ROADPIECES, ROADPIECES );
01427                   AddObjectToHead( i, usIndex );
01428             }
01429             if( pValidAnother && numAnothers > 1 )
01430             { //we have more than two anotherdebris on the same gridno, so get rid of them, replacing it
01431                   //with the visible one.
01432                   usIndex = pValidAnother->usIndex;
01433                   RemoveAllObjectsOfTypeRange( i, ANOTHERDEBRIS, ANOTHERDEBRIS );
01434                   AddObjectToHead( i, usIndex );
01435             }
01436       }
01437 }
